message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a high-quality item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?

Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. How about we meet in the middle at $110? I'm willing to compromise and give you a good discount, but I still need to make a profit.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $100? That's the lowest I can go.
